name: King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (SCI Version)
name_original: King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (SCI Version)
description:
King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (SCI Version) is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It was originally released in 1988. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (SCI Version) on PC.
